CustomField.description: [Special Order] difficult to know if a product is a belt (BCC doesn't give this data on sku.json, only ProductGroup__c='Accessoires'). This field is used for SPO to get this values : 'Leather Goods' (ProductGroup__c field) or 'BELTS' (ProductReferential__c object field if the link with ProductReferential is not empty)
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(ProductReferential__c)), /* workaround as ProductReferential has Shoes, RTW, Jewelry, Perfume... since mid-May 2019 */ IF (ISPICKVAL(ProductReferential__r.ProductCategory__c, 'Shoes'), 'Souliers', ProductReferential__r.SPO_Category__c ), /* Quick workaround to send to JDE. BCC Json file sends Maroquinerie and no information about LG. - Should be great if BCC sends the Group in english like SAP Referential - Should be great to know if Accessoires is a Belt or a glass */ IF ( ProductGroup__c = 'Maroquinerie', 'Leather goods', IF ( ProductGroup__c = 'Accessoires', 'Accessories', ProductGroup__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Category (SPO)
